formattedAddress: 7th Ave & West, Central Park S, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 7th Ave & West, Central Park S, New York, NY 10019, USA

editorialSummary.text: Rides around Central Park in a horse-drawn carriage, taking in sights like the boat pond & carousel.

originalText.text: It took a fair bit of research online before our NYC trip to decide on NYC Horse Carriage rides and booking such a thing remotely with no personal knowledge or the knowledge of a friend or family member was hard.  WE MADE THE RIGHT CHOICE!  Our drivers were very polite and accommodating! If they don't love their jobs, they sure do act like they do! That included our GORGEOUS horse Olaf.  We saw many other horses out that cold day, but Olaf was BY FAR the best looking horse around.  He looked very well cared for and had an amazing coat. He seemed like he had a tiny touch of NYC attitude which we loved!  The drivers/guides (we had two because Olaf was in training) were very engaging and knowledgeable about the park.  We requested extra blankets since we were coming from Florida and it was Feb 5 and 38 degrees and they had them ready for us.  These guys are the real deal and if you book with anyone else, you're a fool.  And request Olaf if he's available.

originalText.text: Our carriage ride was perfect! Our driver was very friendly and knowledgeable. She knew a great deal about the park and the area. She stopped several times to allow us to take pictures and she took pictures of us. It was a wonderful experience and weâ€™ll do it the next time we visit Manhattan. And Benji was a sweetheart as well. He was very well mannered and allowed us to take pictures with him.

originalText.text: Had a amazing time on our tour. The tour guide was amazing (ask for Alessandra) she was very knowledgeable and great personality. Everyone made me feel like a made the right decision on choose them to do my proposal. They all was in on it and came out to be a very special surprise for my fiancÃ©. He took amazing photo way more then what I was expecting really grateful for this experience. Thank you Alessandra & Luke

originalText.text: Highly recommend this tour!!!  We learned so much about the history of the park, that it was effectively BUILT for carriages back in the 1850s.  It's definitely the best way to tour the park-- we saw the entire lower half of the park, got out several times for pictures and were entertained by the musicians in the park as well.  Excellent driver--very informative and friendly, beautiful carriage and horse (Sherman). Thank you NYC Horse Carriage Rides! This is an activity I'll recommend to everyone I know visiting NYC.

originalText.text: Thank you so much NYC Carriage Rides! We had an absolutely beautiful tour that was my surprise proposal! Our driver was so friendly and gave us a great ride around the park. He stopped to take our photo a few times. The proposal was a success as well. I highly recommend this company!
